duties_responsibilities.duty: Establish milestones, monitor adherence to plans and schedules, identify delivery risks, and drive mitigation strategies and solutions.
Define and execute relevant business scenarios to satisfy real-world business needs.
Define and track quality assurance metrics such as defects, defect counts, test results, and test status.
Collect and analyze data for software process evaluation and improvements, and integrate them into business processes.
Develop and execute formal test plans to ensure the delivery of quality software applications.
Document all problems and assist in their resolution.
Deliver quality process training to technical staff and act as an internal quality consultant.
Perform quality audits across the various IT functions to ensure quality standards, procedures, and methodologies are being followed.

education_certification.credential: BA/BS in a related field with 2+ years of overall QA testing experience
